Posts.Content: Aug 2, 2012 03:24PM - edited Aug 2, 2012 05:29PM by ali68 First day of rads Drive along the motor way and a cop car pulls me, "Madame it says you have no insurance for your car" Little old me sits in back of a cop car trying to contact DH because I couldn't remember the insurance company. He keeps asking me if I have insurance I keep saying yes, he then says if I can't prove it I'm taking the car to the pound. Ten mins later DH calls me so I tell the cop the details. I then ask how long it will take he says not sure. I then say ok only I'm a cancer patient and I'm going for my first rads. You should have seen his face, my insurance company had got a letter wrong on my number plate. Very late for rads and I find out rads above my collar bone - not a happly bunny. It was ok but my scar hurts now
